subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|茂り合う|しげりあう}}: to [[grow]] [[thick]]ly [[together]]; to be [[copious]] in [[amount]]
* {{ja-r|茂枝|しげりえ}}: a [[thickly]] [[grown]] [[branch]], thickly growing branches
* {{ja-r|茂り立つ|しげりたつ}}: to grow [[thick]] and [[lush]] (as [[vegetation]])
* {{ja-r|茂葉|しげりば}}: [[lush]]ly growing [[leaf|leaves]]
* {{ja-r|茂立つ|しみたつ}}: to grow [[thick]] and [[lush]] (as [[vegetation]])
* {{ja-r|茂原|^もばら}}: a place in central [[w:Chiba Prefecture|Chiba Prefecture]]
* {{ja-r|茂才|もさい}}: a [[genius]], a [[whiz]], a [[brilliant]] person
* {{ja-r|茂山|^もさん}}, {{ja-r|茂山|^むさん}}: [[w:Musan|Musan]], [[w:North Korea|North Korea]]
* {{ja-r|茂林寺|^もりんじ}}: a [[temple]] in [[w:Gunma Prefecture|Gunma Prefecture]]
* {{ja-r|茂生|もせい}}: [[thick]] and [[lush]] [[growth]]
{{der-bottom}}
